table.name: ADSLayoutGroup
table.description: Master table for holding all the layout group

column.name: LAYOUT_GROUP_ID
column.description: A unique id for each layout group

column.name: LAYOUT_GROUP_NAME
column.description: Name to identify the layout group

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: The Description of the layout group

table.name: ADSLayout
table.description: Master table for holding all the layout based on domain and login

column.name: LAYOUT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each layout

column.name: LAYOUT_NAME
column.description: Name to identify the layout

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: The Description of the layout

column.name: USER_ID
column.description: User Login Id

column.name: REFRESH_INTERVAL
column.description: Refresh interval in seconds

column.name: PRIORITY_ID
column.description: Priority. It is used while displaying in ui

column.name: LAYOUT_GROUP_ID
column.description: A group under which this layout is placed

table.name: ADSLayoutTabs
table.description: Table for layout tabs creation

column.name: LAYOUT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each layout

column.name: TAB_ID
column.description: Tab Unique Id

column.name: TAB_NAME
column.description: Name to identify the tab

column.name: ICON_STYLE
column.description: Icon style for container

column.name: IS_CUSTOMIZABLE
column.description: Property to check whether the tab is fixed or can be removed

column.name: TAB_ID
column.description: A unique id for each tab

column.name: HEADER_COMPONENT
column.description: Header Component Name

table.name: ADSLayoutContainers
table.description: Table for mapping the layout and domain/login

column.name: LAYOUT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each layout

column.name: CONTAINER_ID
column.description: A unique id for each container

column.name: CONTAINER_NAME
column.description: Name to identify the container

column.name: WIDTH
column.description: Width of the container in px. Set -1 for width:auto

column.name: HEIGHT
column.description: Height of the container in px. Set -1 for height:auto

column.name: IS_CUSTOMIZABLE
column.description: Property whether to check whether the container is fixed or can be removed

column.name: ICON_STYLE
column.description: Icon style for container

column.name: SHOW_HEADER
column.description: Property whether to check whether the container is needed header or not

column.name: IS_DEFAULT
column.description: This property holds true when the container is used in default tabs and can not be removed even though it can be customized

column.name: TAB_ID

column.name: PRIORITY_ID
column.description: Priority. It is used while displaying in ui

table.name: ADSLayoutModules
table.description: Layout Modules

column.name: MODULE_ID
column.description: Layout Module Id

column.name: NAME
column.description: Name to identify the module

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: A Display Name for Each Tab

column.name: DATA_PROVIDER_CLASS
column.description: Class where component data model operation done here

column.name: GENERATOR_CLASS
column.description: Class where component will be generated

column.name: EDIT_HANDLER
column.description: Class where edit details widget details will be generated

column.name: IS_CUSTOMIZABLE_MODULE
column.description: Parameter to decide if this module needs to be shown in the UI during add/edit widget.

table.name: ADSModuleVsComponent

column.name: COMPONENT_NAME

column.name: COMPONENT_DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of the component

column.name: MODULE_ID
column.description: Layout Module Id

column.name: MODULE_TABLE_NAME
column.description: Name to identify the module table

column.name: CRITERIA_COLUMN
column.description: Criteria Column for the module table

column.name: REQUIRED_COLUMN
column.description: Required Column from the module table

column.name: MODULE_PLACEHOLDER
column.description: Layout Placeholder Value 1-LHS 2-RHS 3-Both

table.name: ADSLayoutResetConfig
table.description: Contains the table name and other details to Reset layouts to its default values

column.description: A unique id for each table

column.name: TABLE_NAME
column.description: Name of the table that need to be restored

column.name: DATA_FILE
column.description: Data file of the table to restore

column.name: UVH_COLUMNS
column.description: Comma seperated column names of TABLE_NAME, to which uvh values should be restored
